title: Project-Based Storytelling Training to Enhance Occupational Health and Hygiene (OHH) Research Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Research Methodology and Intermediate-Level Expertise in OHH (Occupational Health and Hygiene)
context.additional_context: Hands-on training for conducting OHH research projects within corporate settings.

learning_goals: Learners can draft a paper for submission to a Q1 journal in the OHH field, tailored to their research topic.
Learners can develop competitive grant proposals using gamification techniques for research funding.
Through team-based storytelling, learners can analyze OHH research cases and propose practical problem-solving strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
